remarks: A condition implying that two Hilbert space operators are equal.  Lemma 3.2(S11) of [Beran] p. 95.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hoeq2 $p |- ( ( S : ~H --> ~H /\ T : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( S ` y ) ) = ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) <-> S = T ) ) $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
